items.name: Light Roasts
items.description: A number of delicious light roasts

items.name: Medium Roasts
items.description: A number of delicious medium roasts

items.name: Dark Roasts
items.description: A number of delicious dark roasts

items.name: Light Cinnamon
items.description: Very light brown, dry , tastes like toasted grain with distinct sour tones, baked, bready

items.name: Light Cinnamon
items.description: Very light brown, dry , tastes like toasted grain with distinct sour tones, baked, bready

items.name: Cinnamon
items.description: Light brown and dry, still toasted grain with distinct sour acidy tones

items.name: New England
items.description: Moderate light brown , still sour but not bready, the norm for cheap Eastern U.S. coffee

items.name: American or Light
items.description: Medium light brown, the traditional norm for the Eastern U.S .

items.name: City, or Medium
items.description: Medium brown, the norm for most of the Western US, good to taste varietal character of a bean.

items.name: Full City
items.description: Medium dark brown may have some slight oily drops, good for varietal character with a little bittersweet.

items.name: Light French
items.description: Moderate dark brown with oily drops, light surface oil, more bittersweet, caramelly flavor, acidity muted.

items.name: French
items.description: Dark brown oily, shiny with oil, also popular for espresso; burned undertones, acidity diminished

items.name: Dark French
items.description: Very dark brown very shiny, burned tones become more distinct, acidity almost gone.

items.name: Spanish
items.description: Very dark brown, nearly black and very shiny, charcoal tones dominate, flat.
